page.title: 03Newtown House.
page.content: Newtown House is a home for 38 Old Aged Pensioners. They get up between 7am and 7.30am, and they have breakfast half an hour later.They can have porridge or grapefruit,bacon,egg, sausage and beans,toast and marmalade. This is followed by odd jobs, handicrafts, reading or resting.They have a drink at 10am. They have dinner at 12noon and can have meat or fish, 2 veg. and a sweet.For tea they have sandwiches,fry-up,biscuits,bread, butter,cheese,and a choice of drinks. They can go to bed any time they wish.23 people work there,3 officers,12 care assistants,3 cooks,4 domestics and 1 porter.There are 9 sitting areas,30 bedrooms,1 dining room and 1 kitchen.The house is heated with oil fired central heating and cooking is by calor gas.
